      • newGame

        public void newGame​(BoardConfiguration boardConfiguration)
        States a new game using the specified board size and bomb count.

        A game must have a minimum of two rows and two columns, and between 1 bomb and (rows * columns) - 1 bombs.

        Specified by:
        newGame in interface Model
        Parameters:
        boardConfiguration - the configuration to use.
